name: Grandma's Chopped Liver
author: aj
summary: Liver is simmered in chicken broth and ground with hard cooked egg and three different preparations of onion to make the best chopped liver ever.
ingredients: 2 pounds chicken livers, rinsed and trimmed
directions: Place the liver, whole eggs and one onion into a large saucepan with the water
Bring to a boil and stir in the chicken bouillon cubes
Simmer for one hour, then allow to cool
Meanwhile, heat the oil in a large skillet over medium heat
Chop one onion and fry in the oil until tender
Chop the third onion and set aside
When the liver has cooled, grind together the liver, hard-cooked eggs and the three onions
